title: HDFC Bank CEO expresses concerns over deposits in Q1
description: HDFC Bank MD expresses disappointment over deposit numbers in volatile quarter. Concerns raised over wide gap between credit and deposit growth. CASA deposits crucial for low-cost funds. Net profit up 35.3% YoY. Emphasis on day-to-day basics to avoid performance pressures.
